name: Death Rune
description: Caved into a dead man's finger bone, this potent sigil makes it bearer all the more lethal.
effect: You can draw on the power of the death rune before making an attack roll. Roll a dice. If the result is 1, 2 or 3, discard this card. If it is 4 or 5, add 1 to the Damage of the weapon action you are using. If the result is 6, double the Damage of the weapon action.
